document_data.name: Elah'zad
document_data.mainbody: '''Elah'zad''', which was also called the '''House of the Moon''', was an ancient [[Eldath]]yn holy site located within [[Anauroch]].<ref name=FaA-p58" >
document_data.Description: The House of the Moon was a circular structure made from chalky translucent desert rock. The entire building sat within a lake in the center of a grove surrounded by many smaller springs.<ref name=FaA-p58" />
document_data.History: The [[Bedine]] believed the site was initially a temple to [[Selûne]] until the sun goddess [[At'ar]] drove her away so she could make it a prison for Eldath whose beauty she was jealous of.<ref name=FaA-p58" />
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Within Elah'zad, Eldath could speak through the mouth of any woman who entered the temple. [[Magic item]]s of Eldath could be recharged here through prayer.<ref name=FaA-p58" />
